GlobalApis.description: Run all the configurations for this list of APIs

GlobalApisWithPath.description: Run all the configurations for this list of APIs too, Here keys (i.e. folder paths) will be concatenated with each Api's FilePath

GlobalTemplates.description: List of languages to be used by all the configurations

ExecuteConfigs.description: Select configuration names from the 'Configurations' Dictionary. The selected configurations will be executed.

Configurations.description: Dictionary of API configurations, here Keys are configuration names.

FilePath.description: Full path of the spec file/directory, or any spec file/directory name in the CI spec directory.

Merge.description: Controls the merging of all the specs in the directory, when the FilePath leads to a directory. Default: false

Namespaces.description: Should only present if we want to merge namespaces to the spec specified at FilePath. Here key is the namespace name, while value is its FilePath

OnlyForTemplates.description: Restrict code generation for this api to a limited number of languages

Apis.description: List of APIs to be generated only for this configuration

Templates.description: List of languages to be used only by this configuration

UseCiSpecs.description: Controls the generation of all the APIs in the CI specs directory, Default: false

UseGlobalApis.description: Controls the inclusion of global apis in local apis, Default: true

UseGlobalTemplates.description: Controls the inclusion of global templates in local templates, Default: true

OpenAfterGeneration.description: Open generated folder or file after generation, Default: false

OutputDirPath.description: Path of the folder where Docs or SDKs would be generated, Default: bin/*/*/

DirectoryPostFix.description: Postfix added to the SDKs or Docs generated folders, Default: ""

SdksPath.description: Path of SDKs inside the OutputDirPath. Available placeholders are {template}, {sdkName}, and {specName}. Default: {template}\{sdkName}

DocsPath.description: Path of Docs inside the OutputDirPath. Available placeholder is are {sdkName}. Default: DOCS\{sdkName}

SpecWriteFile.description: Path of Specs inside the OutputDirPath. Available placeholder is {sdkName}. Default: Jenkins\apimatic-{sdkName}

ThrowError.description: Controlls throwing error on failure, Default: false

Sdks.description: Controlls the SDKs generation, Default: false

WriteExamplesInSdks.description: Controlls code samples generation in SDKs, Default: false

HttpDocs.description: Controlls Http Docs generation, Default: false

WriteApimaticSpec.description: Controlls spec writing in apimatic type after validation and transformation, Default: false
